iter::adapters::step_by::StepBy::<I>::or.doc:
The `step` that was originally passed to `Iterator::step_by(step)`,
 aka `self.step_minus_one + 1`.

num::nonzero::NonZero::<T>::get.doc: Returns the contained value as a primitive type.

num::<impl u16>::wrapping_add.doc:
Wrapping (modular) addition. Computes `self + rhs`,
 wrapping around at the boundary of the type.
